definition: surname Ruan/small state during the Shang Dynasty (1600-1046 BC) located in the southeast of modern-day Gansu Province
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
Nguyễn Tấn Dũng (1949-), prime minister of Vietnam (2006-)
Ruan Chongwu (1933-), third governor of Hainan
Nguyen An (1381-1453), aka Ruan An, Vietnamese architect and engineer, principal designer of the Forbidden City
zhongruan or alto lute, like pipa 琵琶 but bigger and lower range
daruan or bass lute, like pipa 琵琶 and zhongruan 中阮 but bigger and lower range

sentences.english: She is in a different city as a factory worker.
sentences.chinese: 她的媽媽阮和平在另一座城市的工廠打工。

sentences.english: Finally will be to Ruan's prospect and the future forecast.
sentences.chinese: 最後是對阮的前景和未來的展望。

sentences.english: Mr. Ruan doesn't just do business in Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 阮先生不僅在越南有生意。

sentences.english: Since my teeth are bad please give me soft foods and tender meat.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我牙齒不好，請給我阮的食品和嫩的肉。

sentences.english: Chien displayed no emotion when his sentencing was announced. His relatives cried outside the court house.
sentences.chinese: 阮文海聆判後面無表情，他的親戚則在庭外痛哭。

sentences.english: So what I worried about most was that he might replace us to conduct the interview.
sentences.chinese: 所以我最擔心的是阮先生可能取代我們去做採訪。

sentences.english: Mr. Ruan will then send the goods by air to Cambodia, or bring them overland.
sentences.chinese: 阮先生會用空運或陸運再把貨物運到柬埔寨。

sentences.english: Ruan comes from a Shandong village where his parents were farmers.
sentences.chinese: 阮風華來自山東省的一個小村莊，他的父母都是農民。

sentences.english: Vietnamese President Nguyen Minh Triet also praised the agreement.
sentences.chinese: 越南國家主席阮明哲也通過讚揚了這一協議。

definition: to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
surname Yin/dynasty name at the end the Shang dynasty, after their move to Yinxu 殷墟 in modern Henan province
Yao ethnic group of southwest China and southeast Asia/surname Yao
pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system
surname Zhu/abbr. for 天竺[Tian1 zhu2] India (esp. in Tang or Buddhist context)/Buddhism (archaic)
camel/white horse with a black mane (archaic)
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
